Connect with Any of the Healthy Belly Members for Questions or Concerns
Use the Navigation Menu on the Top Left To Access the menu\nTo return to the Main Menu, use the phone\'s native back button
Search:\nSelect Search to Manually input your Barcode Number
Profile:\nSelect Profile to Access Information Regarding your Profile
Log Out:\nSelect Log Out to Log Out of the Application
